body: We'd want to do that automatically, so we'd still need another attribute if we want users to be able to write the definitions in different files, which seems reasonable.  I.e. we'd need to know which instantiations to output to a file that gets included in the user definition file.  Since that requires more mechanism, I'm going to punt until this becomes an issue.
